description: Inherited from Middle English boun, from Old Norse búinn, past participle of búa (“to prepare”).

adjectives.description: boun (comparative more boun, superlative most boun)

verbs.description: boun (third-person singular simple present bouns, present participle bouning, simple past and past participle bouned)

entries.meaning: (transitive, intransitive) To make or get ready; prepare.
